name: admissibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being considered satisfactory and acceptable in a law court: He planned to challenge the admissibility of Paul's confession. Defence attorneys challenged the admissibility of fingerprint evidence. See
admissible
More examplesFewer examplesThe judge determines the admissibility of evidence.The admissibility of the tape recordings could be an issue.The defence would question the admissibility of statements allegedly made to police.
